de.affect.gui

Interface GroupAffectMonitor

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GroupAffectMonitorFrame, GroupAffectMonitorInternalFrame

    public interface GroupAffectMonitor
    The interface GroupAffectMonitor defines all necessary methods that should be provided by a concrete implementation of an GroupAffectMonitor.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Patrick Gebhard
